merquaco.pixel_classification.generate_ventricle_maskÔÉÅ

merquaco.pixel_classification.generate_ventricle_mask(ventricle_genes_image_path: Union[str, Path], dapi_mask_path: Union[str, Path], transcripts_mask_path: Union[str, Path], ilastik_program_path: Union[str, Path], pixel_classification_model_path: Union[str, Path], object_classification_model_path: Union[str, Path], transcripts: DataFrame, ventricle_genes: list = ['Crb2', 'Glis3Inhbb', 'Naaa', 'Cd24a', 'Dsg2', 'Hdc', 'Shroom3', 'Vit', 'Rgs12', 'Trp73']) → ndarrayÔÉÅ

Creates and saves binary ventricle marker genes mask from transcripts dataframe and ventricle gene list

Parameters:

  • ventricle_genes_image_path (str or Path) ‚Äì Path to ventricle genes image

  • dapi_mask_path (str or Path) ‚Äì Path to binary DAPI mask

  • transcripts_mask_path (str or Path) ‚Äì Path to binary transcripts mask

  • ilastik_program_path (str or Path) ‚Äì Path to ilastik program

  • pixel_classification_model_path (str or Path) ‚Äì Path to pixel classification model

  • object_classification_model_path (str or Path) ‚Äì Path to object classification model

  • transcripts (pd.DataFrame) ‚Äì Transcripts table dataframe

  • ventricle_genes (list, optional) ‚Äì

    List of ventricle marker genes. Default is [‚ÄúCrb2‚Äù, ‚ÄúGlis3‚Äù, ‚ÄúInhbb‚Äù,

    ‚ÄùNaaa‚Äù, ‚ÄúCd24a‚Äù, ‚ÄúDsg2‚Äù, ‚ÄúHdc‚Äù, ‚ÄúShroom3‚Äù, ‚ÄúVit‚Äù, ‚ÄúRgs12‚Äù, ‚ÄúTrp73‚Äù]

Returns:

ventricle_mask ‚Äì Ventricle mask

Return type:

np.ndarray
